name: Solvation
description:
Solvation is a top-down shooter without traditional enemies. In the main game your goal is to reach the teleport to advance to the next level. The game was made for the theme "you are your enemy", try it out to see what it means! And test the arcade mode to see how long you can last!

Controls:

WASD/arrow key - movement

Mouse - aim, rotate and shoot
